thread.title: BRIEF-Rush Enterprises Increases Stock Repurchase Program By $35 Million

title: BRIEF-Rush Enterprises Increases Stock Repurchase Program By $35 Million
text: March 14, 2018 / 6:04 PM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-Rush Enterprises Increases Stock Repurchase Program By $35 Million Reuters Staff March 14 (Reuters) - Rush Enterprises Inc: * RUSH ENTERPRISES, INC. INCREASES STOCK REPURCHASE PROGRAM BY $35 MILLION * SAYS STOCK REPURCHASE PROGRAM EXPIRES ON NOV 29, AND MAY BE SUSPENDED OR DISCONTINUED AT ANY TIME * SAYS AUTHORIZING STOCK REPURCHASE PROGRAM UP TO $75 MILLION OF CLASS A STOCK $.01 PAR VALUE/ SHARE​ AND/CLASS B STOCK, $.01 PAR VALUE/ SHARE‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
